x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.potential_impact:
An app that allows users to report inaccessible infrastructure and view accessible locations could guide government improvements and increase inclusivity. Measurable outcomes:

  1. 50+ public facilities audited and mapped for accessibility in year one
  2. Data-driven policy updates and compliance tracking
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: Persons with disabilities in Nigeria face major barriers accessing public buildings, hospitals, and schools. There is little data on which facilities are inclusive or where improvement is needed.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

  1. Service Portal for crowdsourced reports
  2. Now Mobile App for location-based accessibility surveys
  3. Performance Analytics for policy compliance tracking

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

  1. GPS/location-based services
  2. Integration with Google Maps APIs

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

  1. Collecting reliable and verified accessibility data
  2. Engaging local authorities for implementation
  3. Funding improvements after identification
